    • Challenges
      • Challenge Overview
      • OAEI 2023

    Challenge Overview

    To support the development of new technologies and the comparison of different approaches to solve a given problem, the HOBBIT project supported several challenges, i.e., compatitions in which different systems are submitted and benchmarked in a fair and comparable way. The HOBBIT platform supports the organisation of such challenges. During the existence of the HOBBIT platform, the following challenges have been carried out on the platform:

    • 2024
      • Bremen Bg Data Challenge 2024 - BBDC 2024
    • 2023
      • Instance Matching or Link Discovery Task at the OAEI OM 2023 Workshop – ISWC 2023
    • 2022
      • Instance Matching or Link Discovery Task at the OAEI OM 2022 Workshop – ISWC 2022
    • 2021
      • Instance Matching or Link Discovery Task at the OAEI OM 2021 Workshop – ISWC 2021
    • 2020
      • Instance Matching or Link Discovery Task at the OAEI OM 2020 Workshop – ISWC 2020
    • 2019
      • Instance Matching or Link Discovery Task at the OAEI OM 2019 Workshop – ISWC 2019
    • 2018
      • Grand Challenge – DEBS 2018
      • Link Discovery Task at OAEI 2017.5 – OM 2017.5, ISWC 2018
      • Link Discovery Task at OAEI 2018 – OM 2018, ISWC 2018
      • Mighty Storage Challenge – MOCHA at ESWC 2018
      • Open Knowledge Extraction Challenge – OKE at ESWC 2018
      • Question Answering over Linked Data Challenge – QALD-9 at ISWC 2018
      • Scalable Question Answering Challenge – SQA at ESWC 2018
    • 2017
      • Grand Challenge – DEBS 2017
      • Link Discovery Task at OAEI 2017 – OM 2017, ISWC 2017
      • Mighty Storage Challenge – MOCHA at ESWC 2017
      • Open Knowledge Extraction Challenge – OKE at ESWC 2017
      • Question Answering over Linked Data Challenge – QALD-8 at ISWC 2017
